abstract: The response so far to "Pulphead" has been about as great as a writer can hope for - and couldn't be, in my opinion, more completely deserved.
snippet: The response so far to "Pulphead" has been about as great as a writer can hope for - and couldn't be, in my opinion, more completely deserved.

headline.main: 'Goodbye Now, Rum Friends, and Best Wishes ...'
